importantArticles.title: Sprott Physical Silver Trust Updates Its “At-the-Market” Equity Program

importantArticles.headline: With uncertainties still present and the potential of an overreaction by the market, investing in commodity ETFs with exposure to metals like gold, copper, silver and uranium is a smart strategy to reduce portfolio volatility.

importantArticles.headline: Silver and gold are again grabbing investor attention following bouts of softer U.S. data, which boosted prospects of an interest rate cut by the Fed in September. However, silver has an edge over gold due to various reasons.
importantArticles.title: Silver or Gold: Which ETFs Should You Buy for 2H 2024?
